ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; The Flock; King's Bane
ComicInfo.Series: Dark Knights of Steel: Tales From the Three Kingdoms
ComicInfo.Summary: The El Kingdom has been ruled with integrity and honesty for generations, by familes from the Waynes to the Els. The future of the kingdom lies with its three heirs and the challenges they will face…but what really prepared them for their tumultuous future? What stories defined Bruce, Zala, and Kal-El? Learn these tales and more from international bestselling writers Tom Taylor, Jay Kristoff, and C.S. Pacat!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-19 05:18:12. [CVDB946052]
ComicInfo.Writer: C.S. Pacat, Jay Kristoff, Tom Taylor
ComicInfo.Penciller: Caspar Wijngaard, Michele Bandini, Sean Izaakse
ComicInfo.Inker: Caspar Wijngaard, Michele Bandini, Sean Izaakse
ComicInfo.Colorist: Antonio Fabela, Caspar Wijngaard, Romulo Fajardo Jr.
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Antonio Fabela, Dan Mora, Ejikure, Jay Anacleto, Neil Googe, Romulo Fajardo Jr.
ComicInfo.Characters: Alice White, Amanda Waller, Bane, Batman, Cheshire, Damian Wayne, Dick Grayson, Duke Thomas, Elizabeth Arkham, Haley, Harley Quinn, Jason Todd, Jimmy Olsen, Jor-El, Killer Croc, Lara Lor-Van, Mad Hatter, Man-Bat, Penguin, Perry White, Ragdoll, Riddler, Scandal Savage, Stephanie Brown, Superman, Tim Drake, Two-Face, Zala El
